data.title: HG101’s Top 47k Games of All Time – Hardcore Gaming 101
data.text:
Hardcore Gaming 101 is proud to present its bi-weekly podcast: The Top 47,858 Games of All Time!

In this podcast, we objectively, definitely and above all scientifically rank the games you nominate.

There are 3 rules:

1. All rankings are final, official and scientifically accurate

2. You can nominate games via iTunes and Stitcher

3. You can nominate any game (even if they have already been nominated). Please do not nominate games we’ve already reviewed. You can check the list below.
